                      throws BlogNotFoundException
        Invite the given user. Depends on the semantics of the sub class.
        Specified by:
        inviteUser in class AbstractUserInviteController
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
        invitationForm - the invite form
        errors - the binding errors

        Returns:
